overview.setting: FeySpace - Where the Fey Wild meets outer space

acts.name: Act 1: Regular Space
acts.description: We're just doing our jobs. Establish crew dynamics, plant subtle seeds.

acts.name: Act 2: FeySpace Entry
acts.description: This isn't where we're supposed to be. First GTSC encounter, Kaelen's contact.

acts.name: Act 3: The Investigation
acts.description: Something's very wrong here. Flow's oath breaks, truth about N.I.P.P.L.E.

acts.name: Act 4: The Resistance
acts.description: N.I.P.P.L.E. is a tool of cosmic evil. Tony begins transforming.

acts.name: Act 5: The Blooming
acts.description: We go all the way. Tony's apotheosis, defeat TWiB, save FeySpace.

playerCharacters.name: Flow Jello
playerCharacters.notes: True believer in N.I.P.P.L.E., oath will break in Act 3

playerCharacters.name: Baz
playerCharacters.notes: 152 years old, living archive of destroyed civilizations

playerCharacters.name: Tony (Ben Bingletonarius)
playerCharacters.notes: Skeleton, secretly divine seed of TWiG

npcs.name: Kaelen Voss
npcs.description: Former VULVA, blacklisted, trying to expose N.I.P.P.L.E.
npcs.catchphrase: Read the fine print. Actually read it.

npcs.name: Giant Talking Space Cats
npcs.secret: One of the oldest species, witnesses to everything

revelations.title: Tony's Divine Nature
revelations.description: Tony is the son of That Which Is Good, carrying a divine seed

revelations.title: N.I.P.P.L.E.'s True Purpose
revelations.description: Company is strip-mining FeySpace magic for That Which Is Bad

revelations.title: Flow's Oath Crisis
revelations.description: The customer is always right. N.I.P.P.L.E. is the customer. Clients are the product.

revelations.title: Baz's Memory Archive
revelations.description: Contains memories of every civilization N.I.P.P.L.E. destroyed

preparedEncounters.name: First GTSC Meeting
preparedEncounters.description: Can opener summons 1d6 cats, must have treats ready

preparedEncounters.name: N.I.P.P.L.E. Security Team
preparedEncounters.description: 4 PEEN officers trying to detain the crew

preparedEncounters.name: Temporal Anomaly
preparedEncounters.description: Ship caught in time loop, must break cycle

gtscRiding.description: Cat stops and sleeps, DC 14 Persuasion to wake

dmReference.content: Bones feel warm when doing good, phantom pain lessens with kindness, NPCs sense something strange

dmReference.content: Company harms innocents, contradictory policies, Kaelen's messages

dmReference.content: Touches old tech and sees its history, dreams of places never been, four arms sort by age unconsciously
